K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100a-8: 'di dag rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab tu gsal zhing nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100a-9: chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog 'di'i gter ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100a-10: phyag rgya rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100a-11: shes rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gsum skyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni sring mo 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100a-12: rdo rje drug ni tsha mo rnams te phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsa rtsi ka sogs yang tsha mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100a-13: 'khor lo la gnas dus kun du ni rang rigs sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-0: zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam @100b yang dor bar mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-1: dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad ming po 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-2: spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnams mang yang tsha rnams dang yang tsha'i bu rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-3: 'khor lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gis bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-4: zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-5: bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang auptal mig can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs pa gang su dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-6: bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje mchod pa 'bul byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-7: sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-8: bsod nams de dag thams cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-9: sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi ru sa yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-10: sa ni rje'u rigs ma rnams rnam gsum m'a ma k'i ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdun 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-11: sgra zhes bya ba 'khar ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang tshong gzugs kyi rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-12: yang dag nges par gser mkhan mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:100b-13: phreng ba mkhan du rab tu grags te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg bya rdo rje thag mkhan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-0: @101a *// rdo rje'i mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkhan mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-1: ts'a mundi ni sha tshong mar 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-2: phag mo 'khur ba mkhan du nges 'gyur gdong drug ma ni smad tshong ma ste dbang mo tshe ma bu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-3: tshangs me nya pa mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-4: dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad ba tshos mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skye gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-5: rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor 'gyur te mi bdag rengs byed ma ni srin pa la mkhan mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-6: khengs ma zhes bya til mar 'tshir ma rab phye shin tu stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi pa'o; ;'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-7: dpal ldan tsunda 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi srid pa gsum lcags sgrog ma smyug ma mkhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-8: drag spyan ma ni khron pa byed mar 'gyur te bcu pa 'od ma'i gar ma shin tu sngon mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-9: khro bo'i cha shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu bo rnams ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101a-10: dpal ldan khyi gdong ma ni kla klo mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-0: lce spyang gdong ma gtum mo dag dang sa yi @101b gzhi mi stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-1: bya rog gdong ma bsnyon thams ma ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro sreg ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-2: mkha' lding gdong ma dpal ldan bhi llir 'gyur te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-3: sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-4: zhing dang gnas dang nye [?] ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-5: rmongs rnams 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor ba rnams dag la dngos grub ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-6: bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig bu gcig ni rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-7: bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-8: khro bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rab dbye sa steng gnas su yi dvags dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-9: lha min dag kyang brgyad kyi dbye ba gdengs can srid par gnas rnams rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-10: gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-11: sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad ste mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:101b-12: yi dvags zhes bya yi dvags 'jig rten du ste lha mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-1: ldan bzhi ste rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi yum gcig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-2: rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams sna tshogs yang dag sdung byed dgyes pa rnams ni skyong bar byed pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-3: bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-4: rje'u mo dmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sam mig dang lag pa dang brel rna mchu sna ni chad ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-5: mtha' dag byang chub rgyu ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod bar bya ste rgyal bo slob dpon snying rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-6: bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su zhon pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-7: dang bor bud med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te dam tshig la ni dbal ldan skyes pa mchog phyag rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-8: rtsed mo'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam dag gis chos phyag rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-9: pho nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus dang padma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-10: rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis gla rtsi dang ni padma gcin dang sha dang rul ba'i dri rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-11: dpal ldan bzang mo padma can du nges 'gyur chu la rgyu ma sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-12: dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar zhes byar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis m'a ma k'i dang spyan ma yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102a-13: rnal 'byor pa ni seng+ge ri dvags rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-0: mi @102b bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na padma 'khor lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-1: yan lag phra ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam la mnyes gshin dpal ldan shin tu bzang mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-2: cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g-yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa padma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-3: ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin tu chung ba dung can ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-4: ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la des par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-5: sbom zhing thung la yan lag shin tu sra ba'i yul dang skra ni sbom pa glang chen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-6: pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun du ni 'dres pa'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-7: seng+ge ngag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-8: ri dvags mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang ba'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-9: rta ni des par 'dod la srid par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gter ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-10: khyu mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-11: glang chen 'dod ldan des par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul ba'i dri dang shin tu rmongs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:102b-12: pa'o; ;sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba sa yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-0: mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig @103a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-1: par bya; ;shin tu dga' ba byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis ma tshim dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-2: mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-3: mdzes ma dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-4: sha za mo ni dri yi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma yi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-5: gdug pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje klu mo reg bya rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-6: mdzes ma sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan dang tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-7: lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-8: mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems ma ste; ;klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-9: de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dpang gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-10: sa yi steng gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye bas phye ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-11: chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sprang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes 'bras las skyes sam shing skyes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103a-12: phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de na yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-0: de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma @103b phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub spyin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-1: phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-2: rgyal bo ri bong mtshan ma gcig pu thams cad dus su bsten pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-3: shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-4: mi bskyod don yod grub pa rgyal ba mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-5: nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs spyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-6: khyi rta ba lang glang po lug dang ra dang ri dvags bong bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-7: kum bh'i ra dang 'gron bu ku li ra dang nya dang ma ka ra dang sbal pa rus sbal dung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-8: bse ru stag dang dom dang ne'u le bcas 'bri dang lce spyang dang ni sram dang byi la dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-9: 'brog dgon khyi dang seng+ge dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khro bo skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-10: go dh'a byi ba sh'a la dz'i ta spre'u dang ni ri bong gzungs mo ai shu rtsangs pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-11: khengs ldan 'dab chags dang ni ne tso khu byug dag dang ri skyegs rab tu gsal bar chu yi gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-12: l'a ba phug ron gzhan ni bya dkar zhes bya ca ta ga dang dur ba dang ni ngang pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:103b-13: dpal ldan khrung khrung khu byug mig dang ra dza ga dang bha ga ba t'i ti ti ri dang bzhad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-0: chu la 'jug ba dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i nor rnams rim pa @104a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-2: bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dvags dgra dang gcig phud can dang bya gag bhre dra gh'a ra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-3: hor pa ljon shing dgra ni gzhan te bcu pa khro bo las skyes khro bo yi ni rigs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-4: mig sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang aa ni la dang gu de mu kha bug gi rkang steng nyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-5: bhe runda dang aam ba r'i ka brgyad pa mchog gi 'dab chags su 'gyur mi yi bdag po kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-6: sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa lag nas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-7: rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bza' par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-8: rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-9: so dang skra dang pags pa la sogs sha bcas chu rgyus dang bcas rus pa snying dang padma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-10: shig dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdag po glo ba rgyu mchu so dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-11: bad ka na mkhris pa chu dang chug dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa khrag dang rdul dang tshil bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-12: mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang kha dog dri dang bshad ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-13: lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104a-14: sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams na rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-0: @104b sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshan ma phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-1: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnams 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-2: chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang me teg dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-3: lha bshos dag dang 'dir ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus la [?] dag la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-4: khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshad ba dag dang sha dang mchen ba dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-5: rgyu ma pags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-6: rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang padma 'dab ma brgyad lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-7: rgyud mang dang ni me long snod du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po me tog phreng ba dag dang gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-8: drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-9: de bzhin gri gug la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos ni ser po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-10: khab pa ma yang na tho ba rab tu gsal zhing nges pa dag tu nya yi rgya dang rtse gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-11: dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad pa rdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-12: rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyi dmar snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:104b-13: chu sri dang ni mthil lham dag dang spu gri zhes bya de bzhin shing lha ma dag dang gdugs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-1: tse dang ni 'od ma'i dbyug pa khro skyes rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-2: ba lang ra dang kham phor rgyud ldan 'phangs dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-3: rgyud mang nye ba'i yan lag dang ni mda' dang gtsug phud can gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-4: sum cu rtsa drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-5: slar yang dmangs rigs la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis autpal 'am thong gshol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-6: rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po smyug gu rin chen phreng ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-7: rje rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-8: yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi sde d'a ma ru dang rnga chen cod pa na nyid dang bgrang phreng ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-9: bshang ba gcig ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni bzhi por 'gyur pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-10: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshad lam dang ni bha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-11: rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba sbu skra dang brgyad po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-12: sgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105a-13: rtsa dang pags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-0: rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshad @105b lam dbus dang bha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-1: lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-2: sen me dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-3: bshad ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-4: rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dag dang bha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-5: rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas su tshando ha yi dbye ba brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-6: rgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-7: rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-8: dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-9: sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-10: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes rlung las skyes pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-11: brgyad ni tshando ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-12: reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:105b-13: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g-yon dang g-yas dang rgyab tu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-0: kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye @106a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-2: gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-3: tshando ha ni tsa rtsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te me bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-4: dud khrod kyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-5: yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de deg rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-6: gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i padmar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-7: zhing dang tshando ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-8: gnas ni g-yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g-yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-9: de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-11: shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan ba dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-12: chu gcan yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-13: khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106a-14: yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-0: @106b sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-1: de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya; ;de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-2: sangs rgyas pa dang zhib pa'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-3: thod pa can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-4: smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni grags ba nyid 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-5: rnal 'byor ba ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter na dee nyid thob pa mi yi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-6: mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-7: de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-8: phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-9: bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-10: khu tshur bral yi stang du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal bzhi bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:106b-11: skyil krung la ni lag pa g-yon bar 'gyur te g-yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-0: sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g-yas @107a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-1: pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-2: g-yon gyi steng du lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na padma dag gir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-3: g-yon pa skyil krung stong du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-4: g-yas kyi khu tshur g-yas min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-5: gsal bar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-6: mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur ba dang ni gud mo la sogs brkyang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-7: lag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa g-yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-8: nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtsa mo lnga pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-9: bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bya cod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang ba'i mtha' nyid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-10: 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-11: gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-12: bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-13: gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyar bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107a-14: sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-0: lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings @107b ba yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-1: mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-2: mtshan ma'i rnams pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-3: lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g-yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-4: mthe bong dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba padma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag ni brkyang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-5: mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba phyed pa ming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-6: phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-7: rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du mthe bong la sogs mtha' dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-8: lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dril bu [?] ra bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-9: khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-10: mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-11: dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthe chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-12: rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mda' yi mchog la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:107b-13: khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shin tu 'khyog por 'gyur ro mi bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-1: med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni mdung la ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-2: thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la 'o lag mthil shin tu mnyam la mthe bong brkyang ba dgra sta la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-3: steng du khu tshur gnyis ngang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen bags pa dag la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-4: mche ba la ni lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-5: khe ta ka la dpung pa g-yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-6: kha t'am ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag par mthe'u chung brkyang ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-7: sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu steng du byas ba dpal ldan thod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-8: gzhu la lag pa gan rkyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung ba g-yon pa rab tu brkyang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-9: gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun tu brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-10: rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdag de dag rnam par phye ba padma la; ;chu na rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-11: me long la ni shin tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108a-12: mthe bong la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog por mi par yongs su bkod pa lcags sgrog la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-0: mgo bo la ni mthe bong la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og @108b tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-1: cod pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gis phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-2: lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar [?] ba dag kyang rna rgyan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-3: lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul ba'i rgyan la ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-4: lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog mtha'i bskum pa dag ni ske rags la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-5: khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa rkang gdub la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-6: de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdu bu la yang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-7: mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang ba pa rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-8: dri za rnams dang gdengs can rnams kyi gung mo ming med dag ni rim par yongs su bkod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-9: 'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil ni srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-10: grub ba rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa mchog gi rigs te tshigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams dag gi 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-11: lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya snger mo can rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-12: khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa na can rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:108b-13: mi mnyam lag ba'i mthil la mthe chung phan tshun bcings shing gshog pa spyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-0: sor mo lnga po rtse mo 'khyog pa @109a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-1: gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-2: nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan pa'o 'og tu sbyar byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-3: 'bar ba dag la mthe bong sbyar te mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-4: mdzub mo bstan ni legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-5: gnyis kyis shin tu legs par 'ongs dang skal bzang dge ba mthe bong bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-6: sor mo'i se gol rdeb pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces par ni brjod par 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-7: mthe bong dang ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-8: sor mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang pas skal bzang legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-9: g-yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-10: skye gnas dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang gnes par sen mo 'debs pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109a-11: sor mo sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bong brkyang pas dam tshig brjod par byed pa yin; ;mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo la 'phrug par byed na shin tu rmongs pa rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-0: mche ba'i dbus su mthe chung dang ni snying ga kha ru mdzub mos 'jigs pa rab tu @109b gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-1: mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang ba sa la rdeb na da yis bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-2: lce la reg na zos pa dang ni lto dang so dang bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-3: lag pa'i rgyab kyis song zhig nges par rab tu brjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug cig 'dug cig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-4: byin pa bral la nyed na skal bzang khyod ni de ring kho na ngal bso des par rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-5: rkang ba rab tu skyod bas gnyid dang pus mo zung dag skyong ba bdag la bdag la shin tu dga' ba gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-6: yan lag kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-7: phan tshun lag ba bcings pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-8: mthe bong ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-9: rkang ba la ni 'phrug par byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-10: mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni de ring 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-11: skra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyugs khyod 'dir ni ltung bar bya brjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-12: so ni phan tshun 'da' bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis de ring bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-13: lce mchu g-yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o nges par brjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:109b-14: mchu la so ni 'debs par byed na khyod kyi sgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-0: sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i @110a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-2: gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam ba mang bo'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-3: klu yi sbyor ba mis ni glu ste mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dri yi sbyor ba dag gis dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-4: phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sbos kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-5: mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-6: zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-7: gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-8: gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-9: pho nya mo ni 'phreng la blta bas khyod ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skal pa bzang la rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-10: mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-11: steng du blta bas khyod ni dge 'am sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-12: yon bor blta bas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' brjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-13: zhi ba'i lta bas bdag gi grog po khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110a-14: skra la blta bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal bzang la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-0: mdzod spur blta bas bdag @110b mchog rnal 'byor ma ni snal blta bas yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-1: mchu la blta bas skal pa bzang ste nu ma zung la blta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-2: snying gar blta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag ba zung la blta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mor brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-3: phrag par blta bas bdag ni nus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la blta na srin mo 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-4: rgyab tu blta na lag 'gro ma ste lte bar blta bas mi yi dbang po bdag ni dam tshig can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-5: gsang bar blta bas bdag ni dag pa brla la blta bas bdag ni shin tu dga' la gdul bar dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-6: pus mor blta bas bdag ni grub pa nges par rjod byed rkang bar blta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-7: rkang pa'i mthe bong nges par blta na bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-8: sor mo kun gyi rtse mor blta bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su kun tu 'gro ma sna tshogs yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-9: pho nya mo rnams lta stangs nyid ni sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-10: drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus dag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang spyin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-11: las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang bcas yid dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-12: khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi tshogs kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:110b-13: mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa slob dpon la ni rab tu phul na bde ba'i gnas su z'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-0: sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas @111a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-1: rnams 'jig rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-2: bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi; ;bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-3: dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya; ;rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-4: de bzhin du ba la sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-5: bsten pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-6: gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po yum gyi mchod pa rnams dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-7: dbang gi mthar ni dpal ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde stor stod mi dgos zung dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-8: dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la sbyin bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-9: sgo na gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-10: mthar ni sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying ga'i padmar ye shes sems dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111a-11: 'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-0: t'am bu @111b la dang dri sbos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-1: byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod par mchod byas te; ;slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-2: dgra dang seng+ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-3: chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-4: dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje ltung dang don nyams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-5: gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-6: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-7: mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-8: rgyal ba skyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-9: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi ba thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-10: slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i skab thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:111b-11: zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-0: zla ba'i sku dang zung gi zhabs te me yi mgrin pa chu gter @112a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-1: dpal ldan zhal ni sna tshogs mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-2: phra ga pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung ba rgyal ba'i phyag gi padma stong pa drug dang me yi tshigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-3: zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-4: rol pas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu de ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-5: skyed mos tshal lam ri bo dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-6: grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-7: gang du sems ni rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par bya 'o mi yi bdag po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-8: nges par 'jam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas sngar brjod srung ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-9: dang por snying gar zla ba'i dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-10: kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang nam mkha' dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-11: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni bshags byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-12: sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112a-13: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-0: de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam bral byang chub spyod la rjes su @112b gnas pa rjes yi rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-1: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-2: rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag gyur cig ces 'dir ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-3: stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-4: de bas sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan phan snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-5: mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-6: dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-7: chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-8: phyi nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshva bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-9: rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha' la ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-10: sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-11: stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-12: khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba'am ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:112b-13: de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-0: aom yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi padma zla ba dang ni @113a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-2: phyi rol tu ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nor gyi padma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-3: phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor byed pa'i padma [?] sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-4: nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-5: snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-6: zla ba nyi ma la yang aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-7: 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i zer 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-8: rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi padma nyi ma'i dpung ba dus kyi zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-9: mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-10: dpal ldan aom yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padmar zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-11: drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying gar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g-yas brkyang stabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-12: g-yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud sde dkar po g-yon par yang ni drag po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-13: dbus dang g-yas dang g-yas min mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113a-14: phrag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dgar g-yas pa dang ni g-yon du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-0: g-yas dang g-yas @113b [?] dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag ni nag dang nyi ma'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-1: de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dag dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyi ni rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-2: phyag gi padma ri bong can la tshigs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-3: nag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-4: rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me yi mda'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-5: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i d'a ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-6: mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi padma g-yas la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-7: dril bu phub dang kha tv'am ga ni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-8: gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen padma chu na rgyu pa dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-9: tshangs pa'i mgo bo padmas brgyan pa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g-yon gyi phyag na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-10: bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-11: gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gis padmas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-12: g-yas na gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i d'a ma ru dang bgrang phreng rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:113b-13: g-yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-1: spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-2: 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi padma rig byed zhal dang nyi ma'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-3: de dag rnams las bzhi ni sprul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-4: dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi zur du chos kyi dung dang gandi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-5: de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni bdag bsam shing du rim pas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-6: nag mo yi ni dang po'i phyag gi mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag na bsil ba'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-7: dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na ste myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g-yas kyi phyag bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-8: g-yon na dril bu padma lha yi shing gi me tog dang ni me tog phreng ba rim pas so; ;dmar mo'i g-yas na mar me do shal dag dang cod pan dang bcas gadu bu rnams te phyag g-yon na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-9: gos dang ska rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub bo; ;ser mo'i g-yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang bcas d'a ma ru ni rim pas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-10: g-yon na rgyud mang dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrog pa'i mkhar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-11: 'o ma chu dang sman dang chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar mo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114a-12: phyogs kyi padma ra chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu ma yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-0: zur du @114b sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-1: lha dang lha mo nag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-2: nag po dkar po zla ba'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nyi ma'i steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-3: mkha' snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-4: shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi na g-yas dang g-yas min padma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-5: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-6: rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong de ni shar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-7: shes rab phang par thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i padma la ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-8: gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan ma dag gis phan tshun 'khyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-9: mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g-yas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-10: shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa padma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-11: nag po rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag na ral gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-12: g-yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha tv'am ga ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:114b-13: mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcas pa'i d'a ma ru ni g-yas kyi phyag na rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-0: gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu @115a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-1: dmar po rnams kyi g-yon na de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-2: ser po rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo 'byug pa dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-3: g-yon du dpal ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang ni nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-4: ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g-yas na dpal ldan tho ba mdung dang rtse gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-5: g-yon na padma dkar po 'dab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me lang dang ni bgrang phreng ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-6: ljang khu rnams kyi g-yas su rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra star rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-7: g-yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa mtha' dag yon tan gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-8: lha mo sngon mo rnams dag gi ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig par bya; ;nag dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-9: du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padma dag la res 'ga' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-10: dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-11: rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115a-12: dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu dman par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-0: phyi rol tu ni brgyad pa brgyad @115b kyis pad 'dab brgyad po rnams la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-1: tsa rtsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-2: shar gyi padma tsa rtsi ka ste mer ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-3: gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chur bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-4: drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang ldan du ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la 'khyud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-5: brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang padma'i 'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-6: shar la sogs par dang po'i phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo be con dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-7: dbyug ba ral gri dang ni mdung thung lcags kyu dag ni g-yas kyi phyag gi padma thung la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-8: rdo rje mda' dang padma dang ni dri med glog mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-9: sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i d'a ma ru dang padma nyid dang bgrang phreng ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-10: g-yon na thod pa dang ni kha tv'am dang padma dung dang lcags sgrog drag dang phub dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-11: nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrog pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-12: spyi lugs snod dang kha tv'am ga dang sbrul dang de nas chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:115b-13: padma nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-0: 'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi mche ba me 'bar gdong ma rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab gtum @116a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-1: ma; ;drag spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsa rtsi ka yi padma nor 'dab la ni phyogs rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-2: g-yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-3: brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab padma la ni khyab 'jug ma yi phyogs kyi char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-4: keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi lce dang gtsigs ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-5: nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs can ma rnams nor 'dab padma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-6: padma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ri dags bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen phreng ba mig bzang ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-7: rul ma phag mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'dab la rgyal po kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-8: rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan aur ba s'i dang bkra ba'am ri mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-9: ri bh'a zug med shin tu sgrol ma pa [?] nor 'dab rdo rje lag ma lhag ba'i lha can la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-10: s'a ba tri dang padma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can ma blo dang dag gi dbang phyug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-11: g'a ya tr'i dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang padma rig byed gdeng ni lhag pa'i lha can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-12: goo r'i gang+g'a dang ni rtag ma shin tu mchog tu myur ma to t'a l'a dang mtshon byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116a-13: dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i padma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-0: dpal ldan dbang mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma ngang pa'i mdog @116b dang 'dzin ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-1: padma'i dbang mo skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan padma dag la mtshan mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-2: de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i padma la ni lha min g-yo dang gshin rje me dang gdong drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-3: gnod sbyin brgya byin chu gter gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-4: ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi me tog dbyug pa ral gri shag ti dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-5: dbyug pa shag ti dag dang mdung dang nor bu dang ni be con rdo rje nyid dang me yi mda'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-6: khab dang bgrang phreng dag ni phyag gi mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mda' dang zhags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-7: rin chen dgra sta rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g-yas kyi phyag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-8: g-yon du phub dang thod pa dkar po min pa'i nor bu dang ni autpa la dang lcags sgrog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-9: zhags pa chu skyes spyi lugs dag ni nges par g-yon gyi phyag tu rim pas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-10: rin chen me long dang ni de bzhin ne'u le dang bcas chu skyes rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-11: padma dang ni spyi blugs sbrul dang gzhu dang de bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-12: zhags pa rin po che dang padma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha min dgra bo dag gir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-13: padma'i 'dab ma dag la nag pa sogs kyi nor lag chos rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:116b-14: mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig rten dag tu lo yi sbyor bas rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-0: sgor ni lha mo shing rta la @117a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-1: gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas mda' yi phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-2: dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung gi phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-3: dpal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na dgra sta phyag na rtse gsum g-yas na ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-4: g-yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhags pa de ni gzhu yi phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-5: dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang padma ri bong 'dzin pa me long phyag kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-6: dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag na lag 'gro nyid dang kha t'am g-yo phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-7: 'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi padma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-8: ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang padma nor bu dag gi phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-9: rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni padma ka rko ta sogs dus kyi phyag gi padma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-10: khyi gdong phag gdong ma dang lce spyang gdong ma nges par g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-11: stag gdong ma ni byang du gnas te dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-12: bya rog gdong dang bya rgod gdong dang mkha' 'gro bdag po'i gdeng dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117a-13: rdo rje mig dang shin tu sngon mo sa 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye gnas g-yo ba'i mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-0: yi drags dmar dang mkha' 'gro'i dbang po @117b ma he rma bya glang po ba glang dang ni gdong lnga pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-1: rim pas ts'a mund'i la sogs pa'i padma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-2: lha min la sogs rnams kyi de bzhin nor bdag rtse mo can dang chu gter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-3: glang po'i dbang po dang ni lug dang chu srin zhes dang ri dvags dang ni byi ba rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-4: bhe runda dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang lam gdong ni bya rog gdong la sogs pa'i zung du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-5: bse dang dom dang seng+ge g-yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs su rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-6: rdo rje mig gi rkang pa brgyad pa sa yi shing rta la gnas mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta yi; ;mkha' ba grong khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa aa ni la zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-7: 'od zer can dang tsund'a lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la phag dang ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-8: rta dang glang po seng+ge bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-9: shar du dri dang phreng ba ma ste gshin rje chu la gnas pa spos ma mar me sgeg mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-10: bzhad ma'o gar ma rol mo ma ni nor spyi nas gzhi la ste mkha' la glu ma 'dod ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-11: snying por brgyad ni kha khyer la ste mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-12: gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams ba khyer la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:117b-13: dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas par rengs 'dod ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-0: lha mo sgrol ma la sogs @118a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-1: dag pa yis te srid gsum skyed ma gsod pa dang ni skyed 'dod ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-2: rol mo 'dod ma dang ni rgyan 'dod mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-3: dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig pa 'dod ma dag gi drug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-4: lus la 'phrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor dang lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-5: gar 'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rkyal dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-6: tsa mund'i sogs brgyad kyi bya ba rnams te de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod ma yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-7: kun gdung dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang skrod 'dod ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-8: reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po phur bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur; ;yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-9: sems can rnams la slu 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga pa lhag ma za ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-10: g-yul 'dod ma dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-11: sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118a-12: nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-0: zhes pa de ltar rdor je can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang @118b dkyil 'khor rnam bar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-1: phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ni spro dang sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-2: de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-3: 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mig 'khrul ji bzhin nyid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-4: rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag pa'i don slad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-5: sgrub thabs dag ni brjod bar bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub bar bya ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-6: gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa bo de 'khrul ba zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-7: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag ni dkyil 'khor dbang po rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-8: dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-9: lha rnams 'khor lo a'a li k'a li'i rigs skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-10: rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni aa yig 'dab ma dag ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang au yig go; ;dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnam gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dag ma yig go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-11: ho yig thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-12: de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:118b-13: lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-1: cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-2: rdo rje can des glu dag gsan nas srid ba gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-3: gzigs nas skyed pa mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-4: rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-5: shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-6: 'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-7: sgra drag sgrog byed nyi ma'i spyan dang gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-8: shes rab thabs la rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-9: rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-10: dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar lcags kyus bsnun byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-11: phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs can dag gi de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119a-12: mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'di ni slar yang 'gro ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-0: gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes @119b pa dang ni ro mnyam byed sa dag ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-1: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i padmar me yi steng du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-2: shar du dpal ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog gi padma la ni lho ru dmar mo 'bar ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-3: byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-4: mer ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs su smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan phyogs su mkha' snang ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-5: rlung du dpal ldan mar me ma ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi gandi dag dang dung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-6: me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'phrog byed phyogs su de bzhin bar gyi zur gyi cha la 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-7: shar du 'du byed dang ni sa bdag nges par padma la gnas lho ru tshor ba chu dag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-8: byang du 'du shes dang ni me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-9: me yi phyogs su rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-10: dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshor ba dag ste rlung du 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-11: lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su ni le tsha brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-12: slar yang 'phar ma phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang dri ste lho ru mig dang gzugs dag 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-13: byang du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni de bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:119b-14: sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lho yi sgo yi g-yon du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-1: mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo yi g-yon du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-2: dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-3: phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po rang rang padma'i gdan la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-4: shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te de yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-5: g-yas su rmugs byed dang ni nga rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs byed dang ni rmugs byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-6: chu ru rengs byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur sgo yi dbus na gnas pa'i padma la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-7: dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g-yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-8: 'dod pa tsund'a shing rta la gnas lha dang nor sbyin gzhan dang lho yi sgo yi dbus su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-9: gnod mdzes drag spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor dang ni shin tu sngon mo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-10: shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-11: gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-12: shar du tsa mund'i dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120a-13: gshin rje phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-0: nub tu @120b dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdod ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-1: gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-2: phyi rol gyi ni dbang po'i sgo yi g-yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-3: mer ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g-yas su 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-4: lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-5: rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-6: dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g-yon gyi char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-7: drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g-yon du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-8: de dag rnams kyi phyag rgyar rab grags ri sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-9: phyi rol du ni lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-10: padma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-11: me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-12: de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni padma chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:120b-13: de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-0: de rnams thabs ni padma la sogs gzhan gyi @121a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-1: rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-2: shar gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong ma; ;gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni sreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul pa dang bcas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-3: stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du lce spyang dag gi gdong mar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-4: me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g-yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-5: rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar ni; ;'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-6: g-yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-7: bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g-yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-8: g-yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g-yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-9: sa ga la ni sa ga nyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-10: dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121a-11: rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang padma zla ba'i steng du padma'i gdan gyis gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-0: gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang @121b phyogs kyi gzhom par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-1: lha rnams 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni rol ba'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-2: g-yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi las ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-3: phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni g-yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-4: g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g-yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-5: yon tan dbang gi bus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-6: cung zad pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol bar 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-7: slar yang rnal 'byor pa yis bha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-8: cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams res 'ga' na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-9: gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar padma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-10: rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-11: drug gi cod phan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-12: sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las padma dang ni me las nor bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:121b-13: rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-0: gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du @122a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-1: 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-2: drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' zhi bdag las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-3: phub dang mdun dang mda' dang dgra sta dang ni d'a ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-4: dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges pa bde bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-5: gzhu dang autpal dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha tv'am ga dang dril bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-6: de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i pags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-7: 'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang bsreg zla rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-8: de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-9: gang zhig la la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-10: thad du ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyi rim pas yongs bkod nges par padma la gnas zla ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-11: nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa de dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-12: gang zhig kho nar mtshan ma drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-13: n'a da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje aa yig go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122a-14: ai yig thung ngur ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang ri yig dag ni phyag na rin chen no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-0: @122b au yig thung ngu snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni li yig rnam par snang mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-1: bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-2: dpal ldan yum ni gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin aa yig las skyes nam mkha' khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-3: rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams la ni a'i r'i a'u l'i thams cad rim pas gnas par 'gyur; ;mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-4: mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi padma ral gri dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam pa'o; ;rin chen dbang po m'a ma k'i dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-5: de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs kyis so; ;aam yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis aa yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-6: ae yig thung ngu nam mkha'i snying po aar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-7: ao yig 'jig rten mgon po aa yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-8: aa yig chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges par de bzhin a'a: yig las skyes sgra yi rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-9: aee yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi dbye bas a'ar yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma //
