K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:122b-10: ao yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin aa yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-1: ldan bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyag na rdo rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dag zung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-2: nam mkha'i snying po dri yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag zung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-3: sa yi snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba dag ni zung du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-4: de ltar rigs ni drug po rnams dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-5: hi yig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni ha:yig shin tu sngon mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-6: ha yig thung ngu gnod mdzes su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig ma'o; ;yam l'a:rim pa rab tu gsal ba shin tu stobs dang rengs byed ma ste gnyis po dag kyang zung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-7: ram w'a:rmugs byed dang rgyal ma ste wam dang r'a:zhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-8: lam ya: rengs byed shin tu brtson 'grus mar 'gyur ya wa ra la dbyug pa sngon po mi g-yo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-9: 'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-10: y'a w'a r'a la de bzhin glang po rta dang seng+ge dang ni phag gi shing rta dag la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-11: dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g-yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123a-12: 'dod pa tsund'a zung du 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-0: aa yig dag dang aam dang rnam par bcad pa ham dang ha:dang ha h'a las skyes @123b nus ma brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-1: bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-2: aom h'um ho a'a:dud dang dri med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi gandi 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-3: ha yig ts'a mund'i ste ham dang ha: zhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-4: h'a dang ksha ksh'a ksh'am ksha:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-5: dbang mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro mtshangs ma dpal mo gzhon nu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-6: h'i hr'i h'u hl'i rgyab tu padma mchog gi 'dab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-7: kshi kshr'i ksh'u kshl'i de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-8: shar dang g-yas dang g-yas min chu dang me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-9: 'dab ma drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung du ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-10: hi kshi la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-11: rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs tsa mund'i la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-12: tam na: brgya byin chu gter gdong ste pam ma: zhes pa rgya mtsho dang ni dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-13: tam na: me dang gzhon nu dag ste tsam dang nya:zhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-14: kam nga:khyab 'jug dus te 'phrog byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang sam dang 'dir ni thka:nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:123b-15: tsa sogs sde ba dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lha yi padma'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams kyir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-1: kyi tshes rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-2: de nyid la zhon ha yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-3: sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas ksha ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min mo rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-4: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur; ;dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzang rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-5: don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying po dri med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang dag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-6: phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-7: dpal ldan yum dang chos kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-8: dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-9: m'a ma k'i dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan ma dri yi rdo rje ma; ;khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-10: gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs dang don yod grub par rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124a-11: rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-0: rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na @124b rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-1: mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-2: rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g-yo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-3: yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-4: stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chu dang sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-5: rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing nges par rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-6: drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje mar 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-7: 'od zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsund'ar rab grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-8: rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yis rdo rje ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-9: 'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar yang shin tu stobs dang bgegs dgrar rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-10: rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu rab tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni padma'i dgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-11: rlung me chu sa tsa mund'i dang phag mo dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-12: dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g-yo ba 'phrog byed lha min mer ni gnas pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:124b-13: tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-0: me dang dpal ldan phyag ni rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don @125a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-1: yod grub pa dang ni de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-2: mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-3: rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-4: sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying da nu'i bdag por rab tu grags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-5: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dus su 'gyur te drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-6: rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-7: phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-8: de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la ni nor lag chos te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-9: zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-10: klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag padma'i 'dab la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-11: dpal ldan du ba bya rog gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-12: mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-13: nag mo 'bar ma khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125a-14: dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma lce spyang ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-0: @125b de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-1: lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku; ;khro bo 'di dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par ro yi rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-2: rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-3: klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-4: de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nag na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-5: mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-6: ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-7: sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-8: khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-9: phyi rol du ni tsa mund'i la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-10: lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-11: gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:125b-12: sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-1: gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-2: thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni byed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-3: ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar ba ster ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-4: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla aa sogs ka sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-5: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-6: rdo rje sv'a h'a'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte ba gsang ba spyi bor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-7: 'di dag gis ni byin rlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-8: stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjes su chags pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-9: skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa pos yis tad sv'a bha ba a'atma ko ham brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-10: bum par rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying gar chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-11: rigs ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126a-12: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-0: 'jigs ma la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis @126b bsgyur ba rnams kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-1: lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-2: klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-3: dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-4: thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-5: rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying ga'i padmar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-6: nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-7: dung dang gand'i ma ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-8: bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-9: 'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-10: gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang stobs khrag bshang ba gci ba rnam par dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-11: lha mo drug ni khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-12: khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams kyis te nges par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:126b-13: tsa mund'i sogs thun brgyad kyis te padma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams nyi ma'i dus spyod chu tshod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-0: lha min la sogs nyi ma'i @127a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-1: zla bas padma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbus kyi grangs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-2: gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams dang ni gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-3: de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-4: skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag pa spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-5: de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyi phyi yi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-6: rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-7: dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-8: dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-9: longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-10: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-11: de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-12: sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127a-13: longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-0: dag @127b pa la ni bde bar rang 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-1: de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bye ste 'gyur med don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-2: g-yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g-yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-3: de ni g-yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g-yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-4: sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mchog gi rol ba'i stabs dang padma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-5: nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-6: gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsa rtsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-7: ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-8: lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-9: thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-10: shes rab chos 'byung dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-11: sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-12: 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum pe dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:127b-13: phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-0: zla ba nyi ma aa sogs @128a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-1: rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-2: so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang padma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-3: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-4: shes rab padmar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-5: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-6: so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje padma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-7: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa sgom pa sgrub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-8: shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-9: dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-10: de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge bgod pa nyid yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-11: 'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-12: 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan bsgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128a-13: so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-0: srog rtsol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag @128b na rin chen no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-1: gdol ba mo la rjes su dran pa padma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-2: re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las aa sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o; ;so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-3: bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g-yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-4: srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bskyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-5: thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-6: gtum mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-7: shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-8: 'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-9: phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-10: so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:128b-11: mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-0: srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis @129a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-2: bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-3: rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyis dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-4: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-5: so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-6: n'a da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya; ;bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyis khro bo'i lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-7: bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-8: shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-9: bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-10: srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129a-11: de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgya; ;gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-0: phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa @129b min; ;dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-1: padmar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-2: bde ba'i sa bon ma lhung pa la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-3: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-4: gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-5: rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan; ;de yi yang na nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-6: de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i padma'i khongs su gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-7: rnal 'byor ba yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-8: sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang [?] la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-9: gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor ba yi bkru bar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-10: thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:129b-11: srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang gtung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-0: mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems @130a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-1: 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-2: gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-3: rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-4: bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog padma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-5: 'dar dang smyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-6: rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-7: rab tu gsal zhing nges par de rnams yid srub gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-8: nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig m'a ma k'i ste chang ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-9: go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-10: rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-11: stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-12: nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130a-13: bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-0: bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems @130b dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-1: de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-2: gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-3: bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-4: rengs ba dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-5: 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgom pa yis ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-6: dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-7: ser bas rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-8: sgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-9: 'byung ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-10: phyogs ni lhag pa las byung pung pa dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa g-yas dang gcig shos dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-11: phung po'i bdud la glang chen pags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-12: lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thong ba rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:130b-13: nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-1: zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi padma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-2: nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so; ;de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-3: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-4: gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-5: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-6: sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong ba gcig bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-7: thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni sgrub pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-8: khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-9: dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i spyod [?] pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-10: sprul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi phags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-11: spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gi phreng ba nges par bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131a-12: dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-0: zhabs @131b gnyis dag gis 'byung bo'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g-yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-1: 'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-2: bsgom na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-3: klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-4: zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang padma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-5: rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-6: de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-7: zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-8: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-9: rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang bsad ba dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-10: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-11: zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:131b-12: drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sbrin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-0: dbang du bya ba bsam gtan @132a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-1: chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lha ni chags pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-2: rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-3: zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-4: dbye dang bskrad pa dag kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-5: dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha min rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-6: yum dag gis ni las rnams thams cad gnyi ga'i rdo rje'i rigs la bsad pa dang ni gso ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-7: dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyed ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya; ;de nas sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-8: pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun tu ni 'jig rten grags; ;de phyir bde mnyam 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132a-9: gtso bo'i thugs kar padma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi steng du rdo rje ni; ;h'um yig ye shes las skyes 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rtse lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-0: de yi dbus su dza: yig lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum @132b po mtha' dag bkang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-1: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-2: thams cad zla ba bzhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi padmar spro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-3: de ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-4: de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi ye shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-5: de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu ster ba nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-6: dza:h'um bam ho rim pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rje dang ni rdo rje zhags pa dril bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-7: aom a'a:h'um ho de bzhin du gsungs zla ba nyi ma rdo rje de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-8: a'i r'i a'u l'i de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dang sa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-9: ha:h'um ha phrem nyi ma dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug tu yang de bzhin gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-10: zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su a'a li k'a li dang bcas chu yi sa bon bdag nyid chu skyes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-11: de las rdzogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma ste zung gi phyag gi padma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-12: glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag na chu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos ni dkar po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-13: dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgoms nas bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:132b-14: de nas bsgrub bya bzung nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-0: gtso bo'i bka' ni rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs @133a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-1: rab dgyes rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-2: bsgrub bya do ni dkru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi nus ma rnams kyis mchod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-3: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsal sgeg mo la sogs bcu yis tshim par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-4: 'byung por grags pa rnams kyi 'jigs pa med byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-5: klu mo rnams kyis 'od dag byed cing 'chi med na chung bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'khyud pa dag tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-6: gtum mo rnams kyis srung ba byed de mtha' dag sa gzhi dag la zhi rgyas don gyi slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-7: de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-8: zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hr'i:ste autpal kha ma phye ba'i mda' nyid dang ni ai kshu'i gzhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-9: de las rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyag ni gnyis kas gzhu dang mda' ni rna ba'i bar du bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-10: padma dang ni ri bong 'dzin par g-yon brkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-11: bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la mda' yis bsnun byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-12: mgrin par gzhu yis bcings nas de yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor du ni khrid par byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133a-13: gtum mo rnams kyis gos dang bral ba byas shing klu mo rnams kyis kyang ni nges par dkri ba byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-0: lha mo rnams kyis spyi bor byed cing khro skyes rnams @133b kyis gtun shing dbyug par bcas pa dag gis bsnun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-1: 'byung po rnams kyis 'jig par byed cing sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis kyang ni sen mo rnon po 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-2: rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros nyams byas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung rnams dag gis bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-3: nus ma rnams kyis gos bral rgyags pa mtha' dag bcom zhing gtso bo yi ni zhabs la ltung ba byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-4: de ltar dbang du byas nas slar yang khyab bdag dag gis tshim par byas te der ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-5: de bzhin zhags pa lcags kyu dag gis khams gsum po nas dgug pa'i las ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur; ;nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs h'um yig ring po las skyes ral gri bsgoms byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-6: de las byung ba bung ba'i mdog can phyag gi padma ral gri dang ni sdig mdzub zhags pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-7: rnga mo'i steng du g-yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhal ni bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-8: bsgrub bya zhags pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-9: ya:yig las skyes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar bgrod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis bsgrub bya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-10: zhon pa rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyid du rang bzhin gyis ni bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:133b-11: de ltar lha yi bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-0: dbye ba la yang rnga mos dman zhing rtsod mang byas pa dag ni g-yas dang g-yon @134a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-2: nyi zla'i dbus su la:zhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-3: de las byung ba'i zhal gcig pa ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa phyag na lcags sgrog 'khor lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-4: rus spal la ni lha min gdan gyis gnas shing shin tu dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-5: bsgrub bya 'khor los 'jigs par byas nas sa la rab tu bskyel te lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-6: dkyil 'khor du ni kun tu khrid cing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas nas; ;de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i lus la lhun po mchog gis gser gyi rang bzhin dgod bya rengs la ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-7: phur bus gdab pa'i don du tshigs drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur bu rnams kyis gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-8: rmongs pa la yang sprul rnams kyis ni kun tu za bar byed cing sa la 'gyel bar bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-9: nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug phrem gyi rang bzhin bsgoms byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-10: de las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa phyag na gri gug thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-11: rta yi dgra yi steng du g-yon pas brkyang zhing gos dang bral bar bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134a-12: bsgrub bya skra rnams dag las myur du bzung zhing de yis dkyil 'khor du ni gos kyis dman pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-0: kun tu khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod @134b dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-1: lte spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thung sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-2: de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste bsad pa dag la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-3: bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-4: zhi dang rgyas pa la yang regs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-5: dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni sreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-6: dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-7: rengs pa dang ni phur bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-8: stong pa'i sa bon la ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang gur 'gyur te bsad dang gso ba dag la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-9: sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-10: nyams pa'i don te me yi zod par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te me dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-11: nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-12: glang po'i bdag po gzhom ba la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:134b-13: klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-0: bse dang seng+ge dag la rkang brgyad @135a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-1: 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-2: rta yi dgra la bse zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-3: khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-4: phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-5: sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-6: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-7: dpa' bo g-yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur ba zhes pa'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dbyangs pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-8: brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo mi yi bdag po ro bsreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-9: dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-10: mgo dang snying ga dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-11: thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i padma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-12: 'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135a-13: phyi rol ra kh'a gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-0: @135b de yi g-yas min du ni yi dvags lag pad ral gri dkyil 'khor lag na g-yas su rkang pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-1: sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid srung ba rab byas nas; ;sngags pas thab kyi g-yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-2: de yi sngags ni aom hrim phrem h'um phat kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-3: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g-yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-4: sbyin sreg rdzogs na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-5: gang zhig sgra sgrog sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-6: thab kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka ha dgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-7: de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-8: ro sreg gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-9: g-yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pas 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-10: dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub bo mtha' dag smos shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:135b-11: de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-0: ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang @136a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-1: po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-2: rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag la stsol; ;dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-3: bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-4: 'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag dang bar snang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-5: lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-6: de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs bas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-7: de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-8: ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-9: gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-10: de las yan lag so so yan lag so so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa brgya lam na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-11: bsgom bya mchod bya bzla bya rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136a-12: so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-0: sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis grub par @136b 'gyur ba ji srid nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-1: phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-2: bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges ldan rnams kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-3: grub pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ril bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-4: khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sogs nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-5: de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig smen sa ni rab 'phyed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-6: mi snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod du ni bsgrubs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-7: nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhag la ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-8: srung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ril bu dag gam mig sman ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-9: byas nas shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-10: ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-11: 'tsho bar pho nya de ni 'tsho la nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-12: pho nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:136b-13: pho nya sprul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-0: @137a *// gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung pa la ni dge min 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-1: pho nya'i rkang pa g-yon pa mdun nan chung mar brjod g-yas pa mdun du yin na skyes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-2: lag pas rang gi yan lag la gang du reg pa'i phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-3: mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang ni 'chi bar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-4: gal te snying ga'i padma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni rab tu bsdu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-5: dang por srung ba'i cho ga so yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la yang bde ba byed par 'gyur sa chu me rlung de bzhin nam mkha' dag kyang mthe bod la sogs la ni nges par sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-6: la la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying ga kha nang dpral ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-7: h'um ksh'u hya hy'a la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam pa thung du ring po'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-8: g-yon gyi lus la sa bon thung du rna ba mgrin pa la gnas mchan khung dku dang brla phyogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-9: g-yas kyi lus la gdengs can rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-10: rgyal ba zhes grags sor mo shin tu mnyam pa'i 'dam bu sprul gyi sa bon ldan bas bsrungs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137a-11: h'um ksh'um ldan pas snying gar shin tu bsnun na myur du so yis zin pa skyod par byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-0: sa yi sa bon dpral ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas pas @137b myur du rengs par byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-1: spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can ni lto bar rab tu bcug na dug ni med pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-2: dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni snying gar rtse mo can gyis nges par dug ni 'pho ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-3: spyi bor stong ba rab tu zhugs shing sa ni rkang par gnas la nges par dug ni gcod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-4: dpral bar thig le dkar po yis ni rnam pa gsum gyi dug kyang nges par dug ni med par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-5: dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas 'jug pa dag ni kha dog ser pos rengs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-6: tsha ba gsum po sbyar ba'i sdong bu srog ni rab tu 'bab par dug med byed la sbyar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-7: yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni tam ga na sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-8: dz'a ti badzri gzhon nu tsha ba gsum dang lan tshva lang+ga l'i dang de ba d'a li dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-9: bra hm'i ksh'u ro aa shva gandha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas bandha ka rko ta ki dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-10: bshad ba sha dang khu ba khrag ni mnyam pa dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ril bu byas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-11: sna ru bkod pas 'byung po 'am ni 'byung po'i rims dang brtan dang lto 'gro'i dug ni nges par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-12: nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi mtha' ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-13: spen pa nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rigs ldan ma dag 'chi gzugs chu tshod phyed ni rab tu rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:137b-14: de la klu dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-0: de nyid la ni sprul gyis sos zin 'byung pos btab dang @138a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-1: mtshon gyis phug pa gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-2: nyi ma gung dang mtshon mo phyed la nyin mtshan dus su rtag tu rgyu ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-3: tho rangs dag dang nyi ma nub pa la yang de bzhin du ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi chu tshod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-4: thun mtshams dbus su stong pa chu gter dag la rigs ldan dus kyis sos zin chu tshod gcig rab rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-5: 'di dag sgra gcan gdong pa rnams su nyin zhag so so'i dus su yang dag par ni rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-6: nyi ma la ni mtha' yas longs spyod nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyin mo'i dang po'i cha la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-7: phyi nas lhag ma can te 'dir ni lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-8: mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mda' mkha' dus mkha' nor mkha' ri mkha' me dag gi chu tshod rnams; ;nyi ma la sogs las kyang gdengs can nor rnams dag gi longs spyod longs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-9: mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong rgyal rigs dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-10: padma chen po dang ni de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-11: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma dmangs rigs sprin nag dang mtshungs mthar skyes dag ni kha dog sna tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138a-12: de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dag kyang chu dang rtse mo can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang nam mkha'i khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-0: mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dbyi @138b mthar ser po de bzhin lte ba'i mtshams su kha ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-1: mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin ma'i 'khri shing ji srid nyid du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-2: de phyir nges par kha dog sna tshogs gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa de nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-3: bsgom na de yi phyag rgyas gdengs can dug dang 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang nges par 'phrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-4: rang gi snying ga'i padma dag la nyi ma'i steng du kshim gi yi ge 'dab chags mgon po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-5: klu yi rgyan dang ldan zhing mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-6: de nas 'dab chags mgon po'i sngags ni dang por aom yig dag dang pakshi sv'ah'a'i mtha' can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-7: de ni bye ba phrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i 'dab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-8: mkha' lding grub na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang gdengs can bdag po'i bu rnams mngag gzhug nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-9: rab mchog sa yi steng du 'byung po gnod sbyin gdon rnams dag dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-10: sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur te gdon gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-11: de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:138b-12: rig byed dang ni 'dab brgyad nyid dang mi yi bdag po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-0: snying por bsgrub bya rang gi phyogs su dang por aam aa @139a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-1: zung ste ai la sogs pa 'dab brgyad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-2: ae ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu dang haksha gnyis skyes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-3: thun mtshams 'dab ma rnams la bsgrub bya tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-4: a'a sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin bum pa'i dbang las ring po thung du dag kyang lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-5: phyi rol 'dab ma sum cu gnyis la bdag gi dang po badzra t'iksha la sogs yi ge rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-6: de dag rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang zhi sogs las la wa ya ral dkyil 'khor rnams nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-7: snying por yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can dang g-yo bar rkang pa dbang dang dgug pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-8: zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang rlung du mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-9: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid pa gzhom ba dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-10: rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'khor lo 'di ni byed de 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-11: sngar brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyi dang por badzra t'iksha la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-12: rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsibs la bar du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139a-13: bsgrub bya zur rnams su ste dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ru na las yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-0: de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyis dbus nas da ni ra ya kshe @139b tstsha de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-1: de yi phyi rol aom hr'im sht'im dang pi kri t'a na na las rnam gnyis h'um dang phat du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-2: re mig nas ni re mig par la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags 'di'o; ;dbye dang bsad dang dbang la ya ma r'a ni rab tu 'gyur te kshe da me do sa tsa sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-3: rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni bskrad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-4: der ni snying po dag nas ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-5: yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyi 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-6: yi ge rnams kyi sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa h'am dang sam du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-7: thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab yi ge au ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-8: mam mu:ham su:manydzu:nyid ni padma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-9: phyi rol tu shr'i badzra gho sha: sa dang ldan pa'i ma/nta bha dra h'um dang phat du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-10: bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-11: de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnam dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-12: 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyi sa ni 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:139b-13: sgra ni gang zhig snying ga'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi ni rna ba'i bugs thos gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-0: de la mi yi sems ni gcig @140a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-1: tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-2: 'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa da dang de ni de bzhin thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-3: khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-4: skyil krung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-5: phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-6: kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-7: dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-8: kha yang bkab ste sna yi bu ga rnam pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-9: srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-10: dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ro ni mnyam par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-11: lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-12: nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyid 'od la gnas rang gi gri ba ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140a-13: phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtag na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-0: zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la @140b gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-1: yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-2: nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-3: de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-4: 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsal bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-5: ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni pags pa dag la khab bzhin reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-6: de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-7: zung gi rlung dag 'gag pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-8: de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-9: mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tshogs yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-10: phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-11: 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:140b-12: phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-0: sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i @141a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-1: gzugs kyi de ni gcig pu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-2: snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya btang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-3: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-4: rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-5: ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-6: srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-7: sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-8: gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-9: de na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-10: ba lang bes rta glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-11: bde bar gzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'geg pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141a-12: bslab ldan rnams kyi ba glang pags par so ma ba lla'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par gyur pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-0: de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi bha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs @141b tshangs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed ngag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-1: aom yig de dag yi ge gsum ste zla nyi bsreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtse gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-2: rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas srid srung na da'i gzugs can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-3: de yi dbus su gzhom med gang de yul dang rnam par bral zhing yon tan med pa'i 'gyur med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-4: rig byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-5: dus kyis shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis 'dir ni srog chags rnams la gsod pa dag kyang bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-6: mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-7: sol ba'o ma'i rgyun gyis mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-8: sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-9: de rnams gzhan gyi bu ni mi bskyed don du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med bsrungs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-10: bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dvags kyi ni 'jig rten du song ba yi sbyin par 'gyur ro la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-11: des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:141b-12: gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan du gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-1: yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-2: gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang rang bud med dag ni srung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-3: shi bar gyur na khyod su khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-4: ba lang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin pa de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni longs spyod ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-5: sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-6: 'dod pa'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-7: yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-8: smad tshong dam pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-9: rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-10: smad tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lon mchog gi bde ba la dga' gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-11: rang dbang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu'i lo ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-12: sngon che sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dzin me dang ni glang chen rta dang shing rta du ma gser gyi khur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142a-13: sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-0: 'di rnams @142b kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rab tu byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-1: gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyes byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-2: zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing 'ching bu dum bus lha yi cod pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-3: smad tshong dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bum pags pa dum bu gla rtsi ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-4: bong bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang chen bdag po gal te rnyed pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-5: chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la lha mo de la 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma yin; ;byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs pa'i mthu las te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-6: ltos pa dang bcas gnas la de bzhin rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-7: snying rje dga' dang bcas pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-8: rab tu byin na dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde 'bras ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-9: gangs la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi bdag po rig byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-10: gang la rig byed tshad mar gyur pa de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:142b-11: gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag la 'tshe ba tshad mar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-0: gang la 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur @143a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-1: pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-2: gnas ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi rab gnas bzhed par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-3: de la sman dang kha zas sbyin par nad ni zhi bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin no zer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-4: sbyin pa med na gtsug lag khang 'dis yi steng gi gnas su dud 'gro rnams kyi gnas su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-5: gang du dge 'dun gcig ni 'dzin par gyur pa de ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-6: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i slad du skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-7: 'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'di dang yi ge bris ba'i glegs bam chos nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-8: dge 'dun dur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba 'bum phrag rnams kyis ster ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-9: slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas nyid de rab mchog sa yi gzhi la chos ni de yi bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-10: dge 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjes su brtse ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-11: de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa gnyis gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143a-12: dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-0: rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnams lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen @143b ma dang dge bsnyen yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-1: bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-2: nyan thos rnams la mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor ba la mchog gi bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-3: sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun tu ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-4: de dag bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-5: slob dpon dang ni rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang dag gsal bar smod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-6: de dag bgegs kyi mgon po bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-7: gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-8: mi rnams dag las dge slong su zhig brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-9: mchog gi bde ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum ral pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-10: thos dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa la ma nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-11: 'dir ni rtag tu rang gzhan bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:143b-12: rigs dang rigs ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dga' ba byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-0: sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid @144a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-2: 'di dag kun tu bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-3: zhi dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgya dang smyang gnas ri las mchong ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-4: g-yul dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchong bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-5: bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-6: 'jug ngogs smyung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g-yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-7: grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-8: de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-9: gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-10: slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-11: gang na khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun tu rgyu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-12: de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144a-13: rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-0: bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang @144b stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-1: sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-2: gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-3: sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g-yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-4: bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo yis dkigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g-yul du rab tu zhugs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-5: glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pas de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-6: de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji ltar de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-7: sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-8: rang byin brlabs pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-9: dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so; ;ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:144b-10: me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med; ;ma bcings na ni gser byed med de gser dang bral na smra bo rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-0: de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sems ni @145a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-2: bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-3: skyed mos tshal lam ri bo dag ni skye bo ri dvags bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-4: drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-5: dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-6: gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-7: khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-8: ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-9: gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-10: rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-11: bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-12: sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang bskul ba med par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145a-13: bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-0: de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su @145b rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-1: rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-2: sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-3: dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-4: gang zhig mkha' ye shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-5: aom a'a:h'um ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-6: rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgoms par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-7: snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-8: phyi rol tu ni zur gsum byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-9: de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-10: mthe bong dang ni ming med dag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-11: yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-12: 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:145b-13: pho nya mo rnams dag la zas kyi phud ni sa steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyi sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-0: 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma sla @146a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-1: yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go //
