K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-2: mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyi yan lag dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-3: gnyis ka'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-4: lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-5: mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-6: mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-7: de ni ri me sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-8: gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-9: nam mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gi rang sems ma tshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-10: lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par gyur gyi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-11: de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-12: rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146a-13: byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gi sna tshogs gtso bos sbas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-0: de phyir de ni @146b dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-1: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-2: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-3: sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-4: gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-5: slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-6: sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs drug a'a li k'a li dag la gnas pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-7: zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-8: ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng bas yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-9: sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste; ;mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyi chu skyes rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:146b-10: rab lnga yi re kh'a sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so; ;dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g-yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-0: nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng @147a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-2: dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-3: ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-4: de ltar nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-5: gsung gi rdo rje aa sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-6: stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-7: de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-8: sde pa ka la sogs pa drug po rim pas yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis; ;rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-9: slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-10: so sor yi ge'i dbye ba la sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-11: dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nya na ma na dang na [?] ka dang dang po'i dbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-12: rlung gi dbye ba ai yig gha dzha dha bha dha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba ri la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147a-13: chu yi dbye ba au yig [?] pa kha tsha tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba li la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-0: de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i @147b rigs ni rnam pa lang yis ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-1: gtsug tor stong pa la lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-2: aa sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-3: 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jigs rten 'das pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-4: rig sngags 'chang gis dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-5: ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan ksha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-6: dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-7: sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-8: lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu dag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-9: dbyangs kyi grangs kyis bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-10: ya la sogs pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:147b-11: khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-0: so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal @148a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-2: de bzhin yi ge so so ra yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-3: phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-4: stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams rgya yis gdab pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-5: gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-6: rdo rje rnams kyi zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-7: de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-8: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-9: yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-10: sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-11: phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-12: bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148a-13: de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-0: dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar padma'i mtshan @148b ma 'od dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-1: nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma snga ma k'i dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-2: drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-3: 'di dag dpal ldan g-yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-4: chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi padma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-5: mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsa rtsika dang lcags sgrog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-6: bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya rog bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-7: de dag nges par byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-8: longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char kha dang mtshungs rin chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-9: sa yi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-10: gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-11: 'di dag dpal ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-12: lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:148b-13: spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ma rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-0: 'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu @149a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-2: gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-3: gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-4: gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-5: gsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-6: steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-7: phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-8: nyi ma'i steng du g-yon brgyad au ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-9: thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-10: phyag rgya sprul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzad glang po'i bdag po'i pags pa bshus pa rlon pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-11: nag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyi phyi rol tu ni 'khor lo gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-12: rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149a-13: sgor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-0: dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje d'a ma ru dang @149b dril bu rdo rje kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-1: dpal ldan dang po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-2: zhing dang tshando ha ngang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa ni me dang rlung gi dbus su yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-3: de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-4: shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas sher gyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-5: snying por 'khor lo cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-6: rdo rje ka ba'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po; ;phyi rol tu ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-7: sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-8: 'di le sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-9: zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can dzam bha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-10: ngag dang rkang lag bshang lem bha ga nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyir tsa yi rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-11: shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-12: snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:149b-13: phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-1: tu gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-2: der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis snan byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-3: sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-4: rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blon po'i snying gi dbang gis g-yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-5: rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir na nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-6: 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-7: thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-8: snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te padma'i 'dab ma phyed kyis lte bar ldan pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-9: gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-10: nyi ma rnams kyi sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do shal sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-11: gsum gyis kyang ni ra ba lnga yi re kh'a rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-12: nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150a-13: phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-0: dbus @150b su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri bong can dag spyar ba'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-1: 'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon pos ni ljang gu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-2: sa bzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-3: sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang gu'i mdog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-4: cha drug gis ni tshon gyis skyed byed zhal yig dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-5: phyi rol tu ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-6: 'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-7: phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-8: de yi phyi rol tu ni sa chu me dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-9: ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa ta tso ka sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-10: rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring pos sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-11: steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gyis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-12: sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha ksha dang ldan nam mkha'i mthil na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:150b-13: mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ri bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag na gri gug thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-0: g-yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni lha @151a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-1: min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-2: rkang ba rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g-yer kha sogs dang rus pa'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-3: mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la thod pa'i du ma bu rgyal po rnams kyi kha dog lnga yi phed ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-4: mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang d'a ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am gdril bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-5: mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor cod pa na yang rdo rje dbyangs dang ni nor bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-6: dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-7: rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-8: gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-9: zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i bgas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-10: zla nyi bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-11: phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'od dag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-12: phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa d'a ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am ga nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-13: bshad gcog khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151a-14: de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-0: ser dang @151b dkar po dam ra po'i mdogs dang nag po ljang gu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-1: rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi chogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-2: phan chun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang rang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-3: sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung pa yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-4: phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-5: lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-6: zhi dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-7: 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-8: nus dang gtso bo'i nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-9: rgyab tu lha mo dbang phyed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-10: rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gned sbyin nub tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-11: gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lta ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-12: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:151b-13: gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-1: cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas te dus ni thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-2: zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal te ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-3: bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-4: shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-5: rdo rje gsum pe rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang tha mar phye ba bzlas bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-6: srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes mthun pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-7: ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-8: dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mdar gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-9: de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-10: rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-11: bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g-yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-12: lnga gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152a-13: gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-0: nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan @152b ni gzhan rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-1: 'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-2: zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni padma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-3: slar yang rkang pa nyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-4: rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-5: nyi ma 'am ni gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-6: rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-7: rtse me can la gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gdab zhal ni gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-8: chu la zhal yang reg bya dang ni gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni bzhi pa'o; ;sa la dri la sogs pa rag bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-9: nam kha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnams la lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-10: de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-11: gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-12: shes rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:152b-13: thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-1: pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-2: thun mtshams cha bshas snga phyi las te zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'o cha shas la; ;shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-3: shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-4: rdo rje can gyi g-yon mdun yang lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-5: mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g-yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-6: drag po g-yas dang rgya ba kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas bye ba de bzhi nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-7: shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kye rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-8: shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-9: g-yas dang g-yas min nyi ma dang ni bod can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-10: nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang gu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-11: dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar mo dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'jin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153a-12: ser po rnams kyi kha dog nag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-0: sngon po rnams kyi kha @153b dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang gu rnams kyi sngon po rnams su de bzhin gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-1: de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-2: shes rab rgyud ni sha nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-3: g-yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g-yon gyi zhal nas sa bya ba la sogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-4: shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-5: /mdo ste pa ni g-yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-6: nub kyi zhal nas nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g-yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-7: g-yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srung shar gyi zhal nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-8: shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-9: g-yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char kha dang mtshungs g-yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-10: rgyab nas 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba' zhal nas g-yon gyi lta dang rab tu gnas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-11: g-yas nas rig pa drag po min dang slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:153b-12: stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-0: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la @154a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-2: de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i dgrod pa'i dbang gis thu mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-3: kha zas dag ni g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-4: mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid do mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po la rmi lam dag dang gnyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-5: rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-6: rgyal ba'i dbag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g-yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-7: rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g-yon gyi zhal nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-8: mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par spros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-9: g-yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-10: mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying ga'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgyab zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-11: g-yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g-yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-12: 'khor lo rnams kyi zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154a-13: 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba skyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-0: dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu shel @154b rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-1: de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la rten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-2: chu ni sa bon khams la kun tu brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-3: sems can rnams kyi ngag pa'i sems kyi rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-4: srid gsum gnas na sems can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-5: sems lag nas de mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-6: yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge ba dang dge pa'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-7: sems ni dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-8: gang gis myu gu 'di bskyed skyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-9: nyas pa de yis skyes pa rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi skyed byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-10: snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-11: gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-12: bde nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes su chags pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:154b-13: phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-0: dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang @155a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-1: de las rnam par dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-2: dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-3: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab dag ni rnams pa drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-4: dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba tha ma ye shes blta bya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-5: 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong can te tha ma chos kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-6: rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-7: slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-8: phan tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-9: phan tshun rjes chags ldan ri yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-10: rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-11: de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul la pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-12: rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lta min dang ni mi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-13: longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155a-14: stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad bar ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-0: @155b me yi cha bshas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-1: 'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par chogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-2: kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-3: de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-4: de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-5: rnam par nyi sh'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-6: de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-7: 'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-8: mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang na mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-9: gnas dang skyes dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-10: sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan bya chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-11: 'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:155b-12: spu dang pags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang ni rkang dang rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-1: sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-2: zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-3: de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzho ma med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-4: spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhigs bcur gsungs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-5: sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-6: de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-7: lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-8: sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-9: de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod de rnam par mi rtog pa las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-10: rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba du 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-11: de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156a-12: sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs sems su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-0: mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs sems @156b su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-1: dus kun tu ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-2: thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su bdud kyi sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-3: srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-4: bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-5: bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyo ba pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-6: de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-7: rgyal ba rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-8: sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gis khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-9: las kyis ra ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes mthun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-10: gal te tshad 'di dag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-11: gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:156b-12: skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g-yo ba g-yo ba med gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-0: sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa @157a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-1: gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-2: de yi bskal pa byed pa du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-3: nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pas shing las 'dam skyes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-4: stong pa las ni myang 'das pa des mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-5: mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-6: rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g-yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-7: sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-8: bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-9: gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-10: de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la dum yis ni bgegs rnams byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157a-11: rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel pa'i don slad dang por las kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya; ;de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dag pa brdzong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-0: glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes mthun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma mchan nyid @157b yan lag rab tu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-1: rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-2: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-3: mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang ba thams cad du ni dus kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-4: shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-5: lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-6: rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyis glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-7: thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di las mgrin pa snying ga la son lte ba gsang ba dag la 'gog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-8: thig le las ni g-yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'god pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-9: de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde ster na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-10: de phyir g-yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis ster byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-11: srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-12: rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'di las te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:157b-13: gal te lam du rab zhugs 'chi bar 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-0: gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul @158a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-1: dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-2: de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-3: nag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-4: brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi lo; ;rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog skyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-5: rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-6: sangs rgyas byin rlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i padmar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-7: gsang bar srung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-8: de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal ba skyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-9: shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshe na bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-10: de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis padma dkar 'dzin dzam bha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-11: me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul che ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158a-12: zla bde la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu bskyed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-0: lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub @158b sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-1: de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed par du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-2: slar yang lo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-3: de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'i de nyams pa las dbang ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-4: 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-5: de dag rnams kyi sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-6: byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-7: gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-8: skyug pa snying ga gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-9: bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyug pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-10: 'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gye bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-11: shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-12: de yis sems can gang dag su zhig 'byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:158b-13: de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-0: shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar don du @159a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-2: mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-3: gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-4: rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying gar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-5: 'di yi 'od zer rnams kyi gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-6: gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-7: shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-8: shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-9: gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g-yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-10: srid pa gsum gyis bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-11: de dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-12: gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byed po g-yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159a-13: de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-0: mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas @159b pa yis gsol pa gdab mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-1: sems can rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-2: de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-3: bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-4: skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis pran tshegs rig pa la rjes chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-5: rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-6: zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-7: rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-8: shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-9: shes rab tu thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-10: 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-11: sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mchungs pa he ru ka ni byung bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:159b-13: gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-0: rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de @160a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-1: yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-2: bgegs rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi padma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-3: zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-4: gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje m'a ma k'i ni nga rgyal rgyu las so; ;chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-5: sna tshogs can gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-6: phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-7: nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-8: gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-9: gang zhig ae wam yi ge la gnas mchog la nges pa can rnams mchog la dgos pa'i don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-10: sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160a-11: nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-0: phyi rol sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la @160b srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-1: khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-2: sgra la sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhan ni da bzhin kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-3: gang zhig ae wam yi ge la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-4: gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-5: dus gsum gnas gsum du zhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-6: rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-7: rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rod rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying pa'i chu skyes lte gsar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-8: bud med rnams kyi bha gar de ni thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi padma la gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-9: de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-10: skye ba snga ma rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-11: bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-12: don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyis srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:160b-13: gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-0: @161a *// dud 'gro yi dvags lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-1: byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden ba'i chos ni gsung byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-2: rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-3: 'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-5: srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-6: sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-7: 'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-8: rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgrod bya min pa rnams pa thams cad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-9: gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-10: rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-11: dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161a-12: sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-0: de dag rnams kyi thabs ni @161b dag ba mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-1: bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-2: phyag rgyu drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-3: 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-4: padmo nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-5: mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-6: phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-7: gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-8: gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-9: gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-10: gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje 'du byed kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-11: gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-12: gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:161b-13: 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-0: gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba @162a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-1: rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-2: gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-3: gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa m'a ma k'i ste de ni chu nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-4: gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sogs dkar mo ste de ni me yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-5: gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-6: gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-7: gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-8: mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-9: ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-10: mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-11: rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-12: rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-13: thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162a-14: dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-0: gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul @162b rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-1: dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-2: khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-3: ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-4: rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-5: ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo de ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-6: de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-7: srid ba gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-8: bcing ba khro bo mi g-yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-9: 'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-10: gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-11: yi dvags rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsartsi k'a la sogs pa spros par gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:162b-12: skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-1: smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-2: lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-3: gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-4: sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-5: de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-6: 'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-7: gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-8: shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-9: de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-10: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-11: sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163a-12: gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-0: ye shes @163b mi lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-1: lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-2: shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-3: dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-4: de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-5: sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-6: nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzum rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-7: stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-8: 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyid ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-9: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-10: nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-11: re kh'a nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsal mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:163b-12: de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-0: rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems @164a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-1: ni gzhan ba min pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-2: gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'geg par rab bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-3: 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-4: zla ba drug gis sdom pa brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-5: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-6: aodd'a 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes dag gi dbus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-7: gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-8: de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-9: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-10: sa yi rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-11: me yi rnam pa me min g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g-yo ba min pas rlung ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-12: stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164a-13: rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-0: n'a da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i @164b gnas su son pa lu gu rgyun du bcings pa'i rtsa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-1: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas padma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-2: rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-3: du ba la sogs ra rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-4: dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod ba g-yas dang g-yon la bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-5: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslad ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-6: padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-7: sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal; ;sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-8: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-9: rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-10: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-11: 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:164b-12: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni ao tta nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-0: @165a *// dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-1: gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-2: 'dra ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-3: gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-4: yi ge nyid ni dag ba'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le n'a da rim pa yis; ;bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-5: sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-6: lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par spyod cing g-yo med sems la zhen pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-7: ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-8: sprul pa la sogs pa dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165a-9: de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-0: rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar @165b bya; ;thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-1: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-2: gang phyir aa sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdang min zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-3: h'um yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-4: 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-5: rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-6: li sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-7: phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-8: dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-9: slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-10: de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:165b-11: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-0: dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyob @166a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-2: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phye ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-3: slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-4: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-5: nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-6: snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-7: phyi rol tu ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-8: de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-9: snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-10: de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-11: zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-12: thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166a-13: sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-0: gza' rnams @166b kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-1: rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-2: zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-3: gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-4: lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-5: spen par bug ba mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yis bla ma'i byed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-6: phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-7: sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug ring la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-8: mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-9: gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-10: mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sprul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshong de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:166b-11: mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-0: de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams @167a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-2: ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-3: de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-4: pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-5: sgrib bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-6: nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-7: yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug ring za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-8: thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-9: dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-10: yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-11: de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-12: de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis dag las 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167a-13: gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-0: zla ba @167b drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-1: drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs; ;reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gis rkang pa de 'dzin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-2: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-3: sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-4: sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-5: zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-6: dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang bsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-7: zhi la dkar po'i zhal ta dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-8: rengs la ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mchungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-9: dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-10: bsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bong la'o bskrad la nag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:167b-11: sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-0: 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni @168a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-2: sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-3: gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-4: dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gi de yang gsum grangs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-5: de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-6: 'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-7: chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod bugs kyi grangs rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-8: gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-9: de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-10: kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-11: ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-12: 'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168a-13: gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-0: de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can @168b gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-1: lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-2: gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-3: de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-4: gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-5: de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shes la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-6: gzugs dang [?] dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-7: snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra can gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-8: de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-9: brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-10: dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-11: mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyams te 'gro ba drug tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:168b-12: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-0: gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal pa'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus @169a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-2: dbugs ni chad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-3: thig le bkag pa 'gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-4: 'khor bdag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-5: spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-6: gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-7: dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-079-003:169a-8: lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol tu ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la //
